author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Assembly will meet for the Governor’s address on January 20, Assembly secretary A.M.P. Jamaludeen said.

This will be the last of address of the Governor after the AIADMK came to power in 2011. The address will be followed by a short session thanking him. Since 2016 is the election year, the government will present only an interim budget.
title: Governor’s address to Assembly on January 20
